testcase.name: isosceles - first two sides are equal
isosceles - first and last sides are equal
isosceles - last two sides are equal
equilateral - all zero sides is not a triangle
triangle inequality violation - first is greater then sum of others

testcase.name: isosceles - equilateral triangles are also isosceles
